InstalledItem.Name: LumaCore
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: ACOM
Size: 1
Grade: A
Class: Competition

Among small power plants, ACOM’s LumaCore consistently ranks among the best for its power rate, cool rate, and high overheat temperature. That’s why if you value your ship’s performance over anything else, this competition-grade component is perfect for you.

InstalledItem.Name: QuikCool
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: ACOM
Size: 1
Grade: D
Class: Competition

The QuikCool provides superior performance over other coolers in its class. This competition grade component from ACOM sacrifices stealth and some durability to be one of the most powerful entry-level coolers around.

InstalledItem.Name: Falco
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: YORM
Size: 1
Grade: D
Class: Competition

Falco is the perfect shield generator for those always on the go. Its lightweight build won’t hurt your top speed, while still being able to absorb enough damage for you to make your escape.

InstalledItem.Name: SNS-R6
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: Nav-E7
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Competition

Increased power and performance makes the SNS-R6 stand out from other radars in its class. Get yours today to see why pilots the Empire over love components from Nav-E7 Gadgets.

InstalledItem.Name: Rush
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: ArcCorp 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

The Rush is a popular commercial quantum drive that lives up to its name.

InstalledItem.Name: VariPuck S1 Gimbal Mount
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Flashfire Systems
Item Type: Weapon Mount
Size: 1

The VariPuck fits between your weapon and the ship hardpoint to transform a fixed weapon mount into a gimballed mount, allowing the pilot to independently aim their weapon’s fire. This special VariPuck will accept any weapon the same size as the hardpoint it is mounting to.

InstalledItem.Name: M3A Cannon
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Item Type: Laser Cannon
Size: 1

The M3A is Behring's entry level laser autocannon. The autocannon configuration offers modest damage per projectile and a fairly low rate of fire. As the most basic offering in Behring's weapons lineup, it features low power consumption, but poor power efficiency. It makes up ground for its shortcomings by being cheap, a feature many pilots are looking for when outfitting their ships on a budget.
